title: Trump says US looking at land attacks in Venezuela after lethal strikes on boats – live
summary: Donald Trump asserts, without providing evidence, that every U.S. military strike on suspected drug-smuggling vessels protects thousands of lives. His comments suggest a broad justification for such actions. Critics have challenged the lack of substantiation for his claims.

title: ‘He may be watching’: Mamdani on Fox News speaks directly to Trump
summary: A New York mayoral candidate has expressed a willingness to engage in discussions to address the rising cost of living. He emphasized his readiness to communicate at any moment to propose solutions. The candidate's proactive approach aims to resonate with voters concerned about economic challenges.

title: Case dropped against Met police officer who shot unarmed man
summary: Officer W80 shot Jermaine Baker during an attempted prison break in 2015. The incident has garnered attention due to its implications for law enforcement actions in similar situations. Ongoing discussions continue regarding the use of force by police in preventing escapes.

title: Chelsea 4-0 Paris FC: Women’s Champions League – live reaction
summary: Alyssa Thompson netted her first goal for Chelsea as the team achieved a commanding victory in their league opener. The match marked a successful start to the league phase for the hosts. Thompson's performance contributed significantly to the win.
